subject: Re: [junit] Multithreading: Testing scheduled method invocation?!
msgSnippet: Hai In JUnit Script , I am passing all the input data (positive set of data and negative set of data) through XML. Finally i am generating Report through Ant.
messageBody:
Hai

In JUnit Script , I am passing all the input data (positive set of
data and negative set of data) through XML. Finally i am generating Report
through Ant. This report gives test case name, status and type. I want to
add one more field called input data inbetween name and status field. How to
implement this. Anybody knows how to modify the report structure please
mail me.
